name: Space Cells
description:
a Game made with LÖVE2D 11.3.

you play as a space ship and try to shoot enemies, larger enemies split multiple times, the further the wave is the more enemies spawn!

after each wave you gain 1 skillpoint to upgrade your Stats or Unlock new Powers like Beam or Shockwave!

Controls:

WASD - move

Left click - shoot

2 - use Beam

3 - use Shockwave

to Play just extract and then Run the "play.bat" file.

Music : https://radicaldreamland.bandcamp.com/album/celeste-madelines-grab-bag

Thanks for playing!
